about.description:
cattrs is an open source Python library for structuring and unstructuring data.
cattrs works best with attrs classes and the usual Python collections, but other
kinds of classes are supported by manually registering converters.

PyPI: [https://pypi.org/project/cattrs](https://pypi.org/project/cattrs)
about.summary: Composable complex class support for attrs and dataclasses.

about.description:
cattrs is an open source Python library for structuring and unstructuring data.
cattrs works best with attrs classes and the usual Python collections, but other
kinds of classes are supported by manually registering converters.

PyPI: [https://pypi.org/project/cattrs](https://pypi.org/project/cattrs)
about.summary: Composable complex class support for attrs and dataclasses.

name: cattrs
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "cattrs" %}
{% set version = "25.2.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/cattrs-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f46c918e955db0177be6aa559068390f71988e877c603ae2e56c71827165cc06

build:
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  number: 0
  noarch: python


requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - hatchling
    - hatch-vcs
    - pip
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - attrs >=24.3.0
    - typing_extensions >=4.12.2
    # only for py<3.11 but we want to stay noarch
    - exceptiongroup >=1.1.1

test:
  imports:
    - cattr
    - cattr.preconf
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
  commands:
    - pip check

  ### These tests could be added if we switch to getting the package from
  ### GitHub, not pypi

  # requires:
  #   - pytest
  #   - hypothesis
  # commands:
  #   - py.test -v tests
  # source_files:
  #   - tests

about:
  home: https://github.com/python-attrs/cattrs
  summary: Composable complex class support for attrs and dataclasses.
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  description: |
    cattrs is an open source Python library for structuring and unstructuring data.
    cattrs works best with attrs classes and the usual Python collections, but other
    kinds of classes are supported by manually registering converters.

    PyPI: [https://pypi.org/project/cattrs](https://pypi.org/project/cattrs)

  doc_url: https://cattrs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
  dev_url: https://github.com/python-attrs/cattrs

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - aldanor
    - Tinche
    - xylar
    - sugatoray
